innate_skill.desc: Deal Psy damage to all foes equal to 77.1/80.6/84.1% of Attack. Deal a Technical and increase damage by 50% for foes with a spiritual ailment.

passive_skill.desc:
Increase Attack by 29.1%. At the start of each turn, gain Wisdom. Activate even in reserve. Stacks up to 3 times. When a unique skill spends Wisdom, apply the following effects based on the number of stacks spent:
1: Increase this skill's Psychokinesis damage by 22%.
2: Decrease foe's Defense by 30% for 1 turn.
3. Increase target's Psychokinesis critical taken rate by 12% for 1 turn.
passive_skill.name: Karmic Alteration
